summary: Rescue the petty thief Kango from his cell in Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
Travel to Whiterun brake Kango out and escape together.
 
He will be in dragonreach dungeon

Also this is my first mod so go easy

Kango is the first of many companions
so if you enjoy please leave a comment if you want more

And ill keep practicing and eventually give Kango a quest.

Kango requires no DLC so enjoy

Also if you want anything doing request it and I will try my best to create it i enjoy a challenge.

Also i have been having problems with his dialog at the moment so it will not be added untill a further date

Version 1 content

Includes basic companion
author: Strawberryferret
